meanings: (때·시기 등에 이르다) be, come, become, (나이가) reach, (formal) attain, (경과하다) pass
(동사적 명사에 붙어) become, get to be, be

meanings.meaning: what is the world coming to?

vlive.korean: 그래서 보컬 1위 되려고? So you can be the number one vocalist? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [TWICE] 뽀짝이는 모챙TV 귀욤 폭발에 지구촌 눈물 폭발,, 저 수중마을에 살게 됐어요🍑🍓💦 (MOMO&CHAEYOUNG’s V before stage)
vlive.english: So you can be the number one vocalist?

vlive.korean: 저 빨리 20살 되려고 - 21살 아니야 - 너 못 먹었어? I wanted to be 20 faster. - I'm not 21. - You didn't eat it? 듣기 View video ITZY : 있지 in LA♥️
vlive.english: I wanted to be 20 faster. - I'm not 21. - You didn't eat it?

vlive.korean: 겨울이라서 약간 곰처럼 체력을 비축하고 잠만보 되려고 이러나? Am I stocking up on stamina like a bear in the winter and becoming Snorlax? 듣기 View video AOA : 엘비스랑수다떨고싶은데나보러와줄래?
vlive.english: Am I stocking up on stamina like a bear in the winter and becoming Snorlax?

vlive.korean: 천러 씨는 왜 나하고 친구가 되려고 그래요? CHENLE, why do you want to be friends with me? 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : 'IDOL RADIO' ep#314. 룽이와 붐붐 (w. NCT DREAM)
vlive.english: CHENLE, why do you want to be friends with me?

vlive.korean: 진짜 뚱이가 되려고 하는 거 같아. and now he wants to be like him. 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] GOLDEN CHILD X LieV - 골든차일드의 눕방라이브!
vlive.english: and now he wants to be like him.

examples.korean: She tried to be more positive about her new job. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 새 직장에 대해 더 긍정적이 되려고 노력했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She tried to be more positive about her new job. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: When I listen to the news these days, I sometimes wonder what the world is coming to. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 요즘 뉴스를 들으면 종종 세상이 어떻게 되려고 이러는 것일까 하는 생각이 든다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: When I listen to the news these days, I sometimes wonder what the world is coming to. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Try not to become a man of success but rather try to become a man of value. (Albert Einstein) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 성공한 사람이 아니라 가치 있는 사람이 되려고 힘써라. (알버트 아인슈타인, 노력명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: Try not to become a man of success but rather try to become a man of value. (Albert Einstein) Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I tried to be jokerous to young students. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 어린 학생들에게 농담을 잘하는 사람이 되려고 애썼어. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: I tried to be jokerous to young students. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He got his inspiration from the singer and tried to become a singer himself. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 그 가수에게서 영감을 얻어 자신도 가수가 되려고 했다. 절대어휘 5100
examples.english: He got his inspiration from the singer and tried to become a singer himself. Add to Wordbook
